Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Epstein-Barr virus early antigen diffuse (EA-D)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SeraQuest EBV EA-D IgG enzyme immunoassay for qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to EBV EA-D in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of human IgG antibodies to Epstein-Barr virus early antigen diffuse (EA-D) in serum by enzyme immunoassay, as an aid in laboratory diagnosis of EBV infectious mononucleosis in symptomatic patients, used in conjunction with other EBV serological tests
